title: Healing Crystals | Sedona Crystal Vortex
description: Based in Sedona, Arizona, Sedona Crystal Vortex has a wide variety of healing crystals and crystal jewelry available in-store and online. All of our crystals are charged by the sacred vortex energy of Sedona's vortexes, so you can take a piece of Sedona home with you.
cleaned_text: Our Best Sellers Shop Jewelry Shop by Benefit Sedona activated.
